casebody.data:
(Republished)

Lillian Horowitz et al., Respondents, v City of New York, Appellant.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on December 3, 1979, unanimously modified, on consent, to reduce plaintiff-respondent husband’s *847judgment to the amount contained in the ad damnum, clause, and otherwise affirmed, without costs and without disbursements. The order of this court entered on November 18,1980 is vacated. No opinion. Concur — Kupferman, J. P., Bims, Fein, Ross and Bloom, JJ.
